DOC.brief_summary: Emergence agitation follow general anaesthesia may lead serious complication like self-extubation removal catheter , lead hypoxia , aspiration pneumonia , bleed reoperation . Nose surgery associate high incidence emergence agitation . The investigator plan evaluate efficacy external nasal nerve block prevention postoperative agitation follow external nasal surgery general anesthesia ( GA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy External Nasal Nerve Block Prevention Postoperative Agitation Following Nasal Surgeries
DOC.criteria: 110 adult patient ASA physical status I II , Age 2060 year , Scheduled elective external nasal surgery nasal pack side use postoperatively 24 hour . 1 . History uncontrolled hypertension , 2 . Ischemic valvular heart disease , 3 . Use MAO inhibitor adrenergic block drug , 4 . Cognitive impairment , 5 . Patients take antipsychotic , 6 . Renal insufficiency liver dysfunction
